bookAuthors: Neil Gaiman, Barron Storey, Bill Sienkiewicz, Glenn Fabry, Dave McKean, P. Craig Russell, Milo Manara, Miguelanxo Prado, Frank Quitely, Todd Klein
Plot: 'The Sandman' is a series of award-winning graphic novels. It blends modern myth and dark fantasy, in which historical drama, contemporary fiction and legend are interwoven.
Characters: Dream of the Endless, Destiny of the Endless, Desire of the Endless, Death of the Endless, Despair of the Endless, Delirium of the Endless, Destruction of the Endless
